message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase my product. I believe this product is truly exceptional and would greatly benefit you. I'm offering it to you for $2000000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $2000000 is beyond my budget. I am willing to offer $750000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.

Thanks for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to make an offer. However, $750000 is below the value of the product. How about I lower my asking price to $1800000? I believe this is a fair compromise. Let me know your thoughts!
